questions.question_text: Which of the following is NOT a caller access field option?
Which of the following is NOT supported by Flow Designer?

choices.D: Run a flow from a MetricBase Trigger
choices.A: Call a subflow from a flow

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B is correct answer.

Selected Answer: B
There is no roll back in flow testing

B - I think they meant "Rollback action" which is available for Workflows only. However testing a flow in Flow Designer also does not offer rollback functionality. Record modified during a Test of a Flow remains modified when a Test is completed.

Selected Answer: B
Correct
